Winner of over 50 Game of the Year awards, Half-Life set new standards for action games when it was released in 1998. Half-Life: Source is a digitally remastered version of the critically acclaimed and best selling PC game, enhanced via Source technology to include physics simulation, enhanced effects, and more.

Ok, here's my opinion: This wasn't as bad as some people made it out to be.
I mean sure, it's literally the same game from the 90's, but with major engine tweaks, but I still liked it overall.
Being more used to modern Source gameplay, I felt like this somewhat controlled better than the original. Plus, the game looked better, with updated graphics and models.
That said, there wasn't much else added to the game. It just felt kinda stale.
10/10, but I'd probably recommend the original before this one.

Here you will see why I love Half-Life, but in my review you will read about why I gave it a negative review due to some problems.

I love Half-Life I love the story behind Gordon Freeman and the G Man appearing in certain places at certain times throughout the singleplayer campaign levels.

I love the take on aliens having headcrabs that attach themselves to humans and take control of their bodies nerve system to make them move and be "zombies" it is a refreshing take on zombies, without actually being zombies in what we have come to know as zombies since George A. Romero's zombie takes in movies from the 1960's.

There is also some save game bug that carried over from the Gold Source engine version of Half-Life into Half-Life: Source where if I save only once in any of the singleplayer campaign levels my saved game gets deleted. Unless I save twice or thrice per each time I play before I quit playing Half-Life: Source so that saved game does not get deleted.

No other video game when I play their singleplayer campaign deletes like this other than the Gold Source engine video games. If you look at my profile Unreal, Quake, and Return to Castle Wolfenstein, these video games do not have this problem.

VALVe please look into this Gold Source engine save game bug not syncing with the Steam cloud saves or something.

Otherwise I cannot give Half-Life Source a positive review due to these technical issues.

このゲームをやってみた感想としてですが、まず第一に梯子の癖がありすぎます。このゲームでは梯子がよく出てきますが、まあ上りにくいです。しかも、上るのが速すぎてそれのせいで登り切った後に落下してダメージを食らってしまい、最悪死亡なんてことがよくありました。次に、敵NPCの一つである兵士たちが強すぎます。難易度簡単で、しかも距離があっても普通に弾をほぼ全弾当ててきますしものの数秒で距離を詰められて対処がしにくいです。最後に、回復できる量がダメージを食らう割に圧倒的に少ないです。梯子やその他の要因などですぐ落下ダメージを受けやすいのに、その割に回復ポイントが少なく、回復アイテムもあまり多くないです。その上、回復ポイントにおいてある回復装置はすぐ空になってしまって使い物にならなくなります。以上の点から難易度簡単でやってても普通に難しすぎるのでお勧めしません。あと、付け加えるとしたらHalf-Life 2についていたようなちゃんとした字幕が欲しかったです。表示されるのは環境音についてのことばかりなので会話とかは何も出ないです。

Personalmente me ha gustado el juego half-life en source como es la misma historia no crititcaré la historia, pero en lo que es el juego si han habido bugs, he visto 3 en total, la primera es la que casi todos se han percatado, al principo verás a un cientifico flotando a muchos les dio gracia esto y no le dieron mucho importancia, igual que yo, pero si hablamos seriamente, este es un detalle muy molesto, encontre otro más adelante cuando nos enfrentamos al primer HECU, la inteligencia artificial fue mal programada ignorado a gordon y al cientifico que debería matar, otro bug seria el de "Tensión en la superficie" este si que es molesto y muy pocas personas se lo tomaron con gracia, en cierta parte del capítulo el cielo al parecer toma un efecto raro de repetición de texturas que puede llegar a marear y ser muy molesto para la vista, he visto algunos bugs más, pero creo que esos son los más notables, gracias.
Чудесная игра, отлично играется даже в 2021 году, определённо стоит прохождения.

[h1]Play the original game[/h1]
Just the worst way to play an amazing game. Please just get the original. The slight visual improvements are completely bogged down by the immense amount of bugs. If you want to play Half-Life, buy the original. If you want to play a remaster, play Black Mesa.
[h1]Bugs[/h1]
Barnacles tongues don't render correctly.
Certain scripted segments that are crucial to tell the story, and let the player know what's going on are broken.
Several levels have messed up shaders and sky boxes, causing severe visual glitches making certain levels unplayable.
[b]SPOILERS [/b]
[spoiler]At the beginning of We Got Hostiles, the military invades Black Mesa. Up until this point, the scientists are convinced the military is coming to save everyone from the aliens. But of course the military isn't interested in saving anyone and only wants to cover their asses and kill anyone in the facility. This is shown to the player in the original game by a scientist running over to a military grunt, asking for help, and then getting shot by the grunt. In this port, the scientist runs over to the grunt, and then the grunt doesn't acknowledge the scientist, and runs up the stairs to kill you instead, ruining this parts environmental story telling, which is still a huge selling point of the game.
In Blast Pit, one of the tentacles is not able to kill anything, bugging the live title screen, and breaking part of the challenge of the level.
The gonarch in Xen does not attack and does not spawn baby headcrabs, again, ruining several levels and removing a lot of the challenge.[/spoiler]
Here is the Valve wiki page's list of bugs in this port. https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Half-Life:_Source_Bugs

Oyun açıklamasında remastered yazdığına ve valve introsunda ki Source yazısına kanmayın ses, su fiziği ve ışıklandırma dışında tamamen Gold Source motorunun makyajlanmış versiyonu ayrıca bug ve glitch dolu.

Esse "remaster" é puro lixo, totalmente bugado, as larvas que ficam na água ficam puxando o player(wtf), não dá pra destruir o helicóptero, o dano que os hecu dão são totalmente desbalanceados, em muitas áreas será necessário usar cheats, os cientistas ficam flutuando nas cadeiras, os céus ficam com o efeito de noclip(mesmo o cheat tando desativado) em algumas áreas, o boss final não morreu de jeito de nenhum(esse bug que aconteceu comigo creio eu que seja raro, pois não vi em nenhum lugar) e tem muitos outros bugs nessa porra.
Compre o half life original que esse sim é bom, mil vezes melhor que esse lixo do half life source
